titles: A vindication of An essay concerning critical and curious learning in which are contained some short reflections on the controversie betwixt Sir William Temple and Mr. Wotton, and that betwixt Dr. Bentley and Mr. Boyle : in an answer to an Oxford pamphlet / by the author of that essay.
author: Rymer, Thomas, 1641-1713.
notes: Signed at end: T.R. [i.e. Thomas Rymer]
Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Rymer.
Imperfect: print show-through with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Rymer, Thomas, 1641-1713. --  Essay concerning critical and curious learning.
